Flying, vigilance
[i]Boundless Growth [/i]– You have no maximum hand size.
[i]Dawn's Spear[/i] – When Emma enters or becomes promoted, draw cards equal to her power.
[i]Sky's Warden[/i] – Whenever a creature attacks you, you may discard a card. If you do, it gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{G}{W}{U}
